product_name: Novara Mia Gel Double Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: The women's Novara Mia Gel Double Bike Shorts have a gel-padded chamois that absorbs shock, keeping you extra comfortable on long trail rides. Rugged and flexible nylon outer shorts move easily with you; durable water repellent finish sheds light moisture. Button-tabs allow you to roll up hems for a shorter look. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying stretch-mesh liner shorts allow ventilation. Full-coverage, women-specific gel chamois features ample cushioning and a microfiber cover that wicks moisture away. Liner shorts feature elastic grippers at hems to keep shorts from riding up. Novara Mia Gel Double Bike Shorts have 2 front zip pockets and 2 back pockets. Fixed waistband with a zipper fly and double-snap closure; belt loops.
short_description: The women's Novara Mia Gel Double Bike Shorts have a gel-padded chamois that absorbs shock, keeping you extra comfortable on long trail rides.
